data.eml:eml: The genus Vieira Navás (Neuroptera: Chrysopidae): a new species, a key to the species, and new geographic records

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sosa, Francisco, Tauber, Catherine A. (2017): The genus Vieira Navás (Neuroptera: Chrysopidae): a new species, a key to the species, and new geographic records. Zootaxa 4258 (1): 43-59, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4258.1.3
